thread.title: Rhona Collis
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Rhona Collis

author: Rhona Collis
title: Rhona Collis
text:
Not only were the gloves lovely and warm but they were very soft and comfortable to wear. For years I have worn finger gloves for skiing and took some convincing to swap to mittens. I've no regrets- these gloves have finger linings but are mittens. Best of both worlds!
Expensive but worth the investment. ðŸ˜ƒ
